title: Calories in Chicken Shawarma
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken shawarma per serving, including protein, carbs, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for your wrap.

quick_answer.text: One chicken shawarma serving provides ~420 kcal and ~28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat pita instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken shawarma wrap?
faqs.a: About 420 kcal for a standard serving with pita, veggies, and tahini.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in chicken shawarma?
faqs.a: Roughly 28 g protein per serving from the grilled chicken.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in chicken shawarma?
faqs.a: Yes, around 48 g carbs mainly from the pita bread; fiber is ~4 g.

faqs.q: How does preparation affect calories in chicken shawarma?
faqs.a: Grilling keeps it lower; frying or extra oil/sauce can add 100+ kcal.

faqs.q: Is chicken shawarma high in sodium?
